articles.content: Tata Sons is considering Tata Steel's exit from its UK business with little hope of a £1.5 billion subsidy package for the proposed transition to green energy from the British government led by Liz T… [+3991 chars]

articles.author: Priyanka Salve
articles.title: Cement sector’s quick-drying consolidation has begun after Adani group’s entry. What’s next? - Economic Times
articles.description: Adani Groups entry in Indias cement industry has stirred things up for the sector which was till now dominated by UltraTech Cement. Many small and mid-sized players are looking for the next play. Should they cash out or stay the course for better valuations? …
articles.content: SynopsisAdani Group’s entry in India’s cement industry has stirred things up for the sector which was till now dominated by UltraTech Cement. Many small and mid-sized players are looking for the next… [+144 chars]
